company.company-comments: 8/24/12 SL: Manual Case added. 8/28/12 DB: OO lab enabled 9/17/12 DB: Updating manual case. Lab disabled. 9/20/12 DB: Manual case updated. Lab enabled. 7/18/13 DB: In their own words text comes directly from company. 12/10/13 TN: Disabled DAA opt out due to bug 12/12/13 TN: Bug only occured cause my Firefox was corrupt. DAA opt out restored 3/4/14 DB: DO NOT CHANGE LOGO WITHOUT CONSULTING TOM. Company part of AdChoices. 7/29/14 DB: Opt-out: direct OO not working. Disabling.
company.company-daa-description: Rocket Fuel delivers a leading programmatic media-buying platform at big data scale that harnesses the power of artificial intelligence to improve marketing ROI. Rocket Fuel's Advertising That LearnsTM technology empowers media teams to focus on strategy, not spreadsheets.
company.company-description: Rocket Fuel is a real-time targeting company that transforms digital media buys into optimization engines, driving campaign results from awareness to sales.
company.company-in-their-own-words: "Rocket Fuel delivers a leading programmatic media-buying platform at big data scale that harnesses the power of artificial intelligence to improve marketing ROI. Rocket Fuel's Advertising That LearnsTM technology empowers media teams to focus on strategy, not spreadsheets. Rocket Fuel was founded by online-advertising veterans and rocket scientists from NASA, Yahoo!, Salesforce.com, and DoubleClick. Rocket Fuel has offices worldwide, including locations in New York, London, Paris, and Hamburg."
company.collection-policies-text: Data Collection|Anonymous: Ad Views, Interaction Data , Page Views |Pseudonymous: IP Address (EU PII)||Data Sharing|Anonymous data is shared with 3rd parties.||Data Retention|2-3 Years||Data Use|Ad Serving, Ad Targeting

company.company-comments: 8/7/12 CT: Supports DNT 9/12/12 DB: Updated indirect OO URL and created ticket to update manual case. 9/26/12 DB: Manual case updated and lab enabled. 3/20/13 DB: Updated direct opt in 12/4/13 DB: BlueKai uses device finger-printing, so direct OO no longer valid. Disabling direct OO and updating manual case for indirect. 12/6/13 DB: Opt-out: lab enabled 5/12/14 TN: Turned off 1st Party because site is breaking in FF.
company.company-description: BlueKai operates an auction based, online data exchange. Unlike ad networks, BlueKai does not sell ads or impressions but provides on-demand data to networks, ad exchanges, agencies, creative optimizers, demand and sell-side platforms. Marketers and networks utilize BlueKai's aggregate shopping and research data to improve ad targeting, while publishers can earn revenue as intent data providers. BlueKai partners with data solution companies including — datalogix, TARGUSinfo, Experian, Bizo, Nielsen, Acxiom, and Polk to aggregate a large source of high performance intent data.
company.company-in-their-own-words: "BlueKai is at the center of the digital data economy and the largest auction marketplace for all audience data. With data quality and fair market pricing at its core, BlueKai attracts top tier providers with intent data on valuable in-market shoppers across key verticals."
company.company-preference-manager-description: If the area below is blank, then you have not opted out of BlueKai, and neither BlueKai nor its clients are storing any interests tied to you on your computer.
company.collection-policies-keys: data_collected|data_collection.anonymous: data_collection.browser_information, data_collection.date_time, data_collection.hardware_software_type, data_collection.page_views, data_collection.serving_domains|data_collection.pseudonymous: data_collection.ip_address_eu_pii, data_collection.clickstream_data||data_sharing|data_collection.anonymous_data_is_shared_with_3rd_parties||data_retention|data_collection.6_12_months||data_user_title|data_collection.ad_targeting, data_collection.analytics_measurement
